## Fetch Network Papers from Pubmed

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r}
library(RISmed)
library(ggplot2)

query_term="cytoscape"
res<-EUtilsSummary(query_term,type="esearch",db="pubmed",datetype='pdat',mindate=2006,maxdate=2017,retmax=1000)
QueryCount(res)

# Fetch Year
result<-EUtilsGet(res)
year<-YearPubmed(result)
year<-na.omit(year)

qplot(as.factor(year),fill=I('royalblue'),xlab="Year of Publication",ylab="Number of papers",
      main=paste("PubMed Articles containing '",query_term,"'; n=",length(year),sep=""))+
  theme_bw()+
  geom_text(stat='count',aes(label=..count..),vjust=-0.25)
```
